game.name: Portal Guardian
game.shortDescription: 당신은 비밀 수호 조직 ‘포탈 가디언’의 마지막 생존자입니다. 왕국은 수세기 동안 안전했지만 어둠이 깨어나고 있습니다… 타워와 마법을 사용해 포탈을 지키지 않으면 모든 것이 사라집니다!
game.shortDescriptionEn: You are the sole living member of a secret society of protectors known as the Portal Guardians. The Realm has been kept safe and unaware for centuries, but something dark and relentless has been stirring... Unleash the fury of your towers and magic to defend the portal and the realm or all is lost!
